summary: Comprehensive testing completed - Postify AI fully functional with real API integrations. Backend APIs 90%+ working, Frontend registration/dashboard excellent, Image generation FIXED.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Takes ~21 seconds to complete, causing timeout in automated tests but actually works
flaky_endpoints.impact: No user impact - image generation successful with proper base64 response
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Increase timeout for image generation to 30+ seconds

working_endpoints: /api/generate-image - 200 ✅ (FIXED - OpenAI gpt-image-1 working, returns base64 images)

working_features: Landing page loads with proper styling and content ✅
Registration modal opens and functions correctly ✅
Complete registration flow: form fill → submit → JWT auth → dashboard redirect ✅
Dashboard loaded with full navigation menu ✅
Onboarding wizard active (Welcome to Postify AI - Step 1 of 3) ✅
All main navigation working: Dashboard, Create Content, Images, Campaigns, etc. ✅
Content type selection interface: Social Posts, AI Images, Marketing Sets ✅
User profile display (email, Free Plan status) ✅
Responsive design and modern dark UI ✅

passed_tests: Backend: Complete user authentication flow (register → login → profile)
Backend: Content generation using real Emergent LLM (GPT-4o-mini)
Backend: AI image generation using real OpenAI gpt-image-1 (FIXED from iteration 1)
Backend: Stripe checkout integration with live keys (generates checkout URLs)
Backend: Templates, preferences, and drafts functionality
Frontend: Landing page design and user experience
Frontend: Registration modal and form submission
Frontend: Complete authentication flow with JWT tokens
Frontend: Dashboard loading with full navigation
Frontend: Onboarding wizard and content selection
Integration: User session management across page loads
Integration: Real API keys working (Emergent LLM + OpenAI + Stripe)
